channel.title: Access Key on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Access Key on Metricly Docs

item.title: Access Key
item.description: Access key Setting up an AWS integration is a two step process: Create a new AWS integration in Metricly and share the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key of the desired IAM read-only user. Optionally, filter your AWS elements for inclusion in Metricly by creating or choosing an existing tag (key-value pair), then assigning that tag to the desired elements in AWS. Step 1: Create a new AWS integration From the top navigation menu, select Integrations.
